scripts.pod:install: cd ios && bundle exec pod install && cd ..
scripts.codepush:ios: ENV=production bundle exec fastlane ios codepush
scripts.codepush:android: ENV=production bundle exec fastlane android codepush
scripts.codepush:ios:staging: ENV=staging bundle exec fastlane ios codepush
scripts.codepush:android:staging: ENV=staging bundle exec fastlane android codepush
